CVE-2012-0022.title: Apache Tomcat parameter denial of service
CVE-2012-0022.body: Apache Tomcat is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of an overly large number of parameter and parameter values. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume an overly large amount of CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Tomcat (7.023 or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-0025.title: libfpx Free_All_Memory() code execution
CVE-2012-0025.body: libfpx could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a double free error in the Free_All_Memory() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted FPX image, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. Note: This vulnerability also affects the FlashPix PlugIn for IrfanView.For libfpx: Upgrade to the latest version of libfpx (1.3.1-1 or later), available from the libfpx Web page. See References. For the FlashPix PlugIn for IrfanView: Upgrade to the latest version of libfpx (4.3.20 or later), available from the IrfanView Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0029.title: QEMU process_tx_desc() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0029.body: QEMU is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the process_tx_desc() function. By sending a specially-crafted packet, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash. Note: This vulnerability also affects KVM.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the QEMU GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2012-0037.title: OpenOffice.org XML information disclosure
CVE-2012-0037.body: OpenOffice.org could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when processing XML external entities within an ODF document. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ODF document, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain arbitrary file content. Note: This vulnerability also affects other products.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenOffice.org (3.4 or later), available from the OpenOffice.org Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-0047.title: Apache Wicket unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0047.body: Apache Wicket is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the wicket:pageMapName parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Wicket (1.4.20 or later), available from the Apache Wicket Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0057.title: PHP libxslt security bypass
CVE-2012-0057.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper libxslt settings. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted XSLT stylesheet to bypass restrictions to create arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.3.9 or later), available from the The PHP Group Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0060.title: RPM Package Manager headerLoad(), rpmReadSignature(), and headerVerify() code execution
CVE-2012-0060.body: RPM Package Manager could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by insufficient validation of region tags in the headerLoad(), rpmReadSignature(), and headerVerify() functions. By persuading a victim to interact with a specially-crafted RPM file via an application that utilizes the RPM library, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the affected application to crash.Refer to RHSA-2012-0451 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0061.title: RPM Package Manager headerLoad() code execution
CVE-2012-0061.body: RPM Package Manager could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of header contents total size in the headerLoad() function. By persuading a victim to interact with a specially-crafted RPM file via an application that utilizes the RPM library, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the affected application to crash.Refer to RHSA-2012-0451 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0069.title: Batavi ajax.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-0069.body: Batavi is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the ajax.php script using the boxToReload parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Batavi (1.2.1 or later), available from the Batavi Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0128.title: HP Onboard Administrator unspecified open redirect
CVE-2012-0128.body: HP Onboard Administrator could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by an open redirect vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.Refer to HPSBMU02759 SSRT100817 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0129.title: HP Onboard Administrator unspecified unauthorized access
CVE-2012-0129.body: An unspecified error in HP Onboard Administrator could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access using unknown attack vectors.Refer to HPSBMU02759 SSRT100817 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0130.title: HP Onboard Administrator unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2012-0130.body: An unspecified error in HP Onboard Administrator could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information using unknown attack vectors.Refer to HPSBMU02759 SSRT100817 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0158.title: Microsoft Windows MSCOMCTL.OCX ActiveX control code execution
CVE-2012-0158.body: The Microsoft Windows Common Controls ActiveX control (MSCOMCTL.OCX) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string argument, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2012-0159.title: Microsoft Windows TrueType code execution
CVE-2012-0159.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper processing of a malicious TrueType font. By persuading a victim to load a specially-crafted TrueType font file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2012-0163.title: Microsoft .NET Framework parameter code execution
CVE-2012-0163.body: Microsoft .NET Framework could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper validation of parameters when passing data to a function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site containing a malicious XAML browser application, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2012-0165.title: Microsoft Windows GDI+ EMF code execution
CVE-2012-0165.body: Microsoft Windows GDI+ could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper validation of EMF images. By persuading a victim open a specially-crafted EMF image file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2012-0169.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer JScript9 code execution
CVE-2012-0169.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error related to JScript9 when attempting to access objects that have been deleted. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the victim.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References. — OR — Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-0170.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer OnReadyStateChange code execution
CVE-2012-0170.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error related to OnReadyStateChange when attempting to access objects that have been deleted. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2012-0172.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer VML code execution
CVE-2012-0172.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error related to VML when attempting to access objects that have been deleted. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2012-0174.title: Microsoft Windows broadcast packets security bypass
CVE-2012-0174.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper filtering of outbound broadcast packets with an applied outbound firewall rule by the TCP/IP stack (tcpip.sys). An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the Windows Firewall and launch further attacks on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2012-0185.title: Microsoft Excel MergeCells buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0185.body: Microsoft Excel is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking related to MergeCells record memory. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Excel file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2012-0186.title: IBM Lotus Expeditor Eclipse Help component directory traversal
CVE-2012-0186.body: IBM Lotus Expeditor could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input to the Eclipse Help component. By persuading a victim to open specially-crafted URL, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view arbitrary files on the system. Note: This vulnerability can be exploited remotely without victim interaction if remote access to the Eclipse Help apis is enabled.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1575642 or 1599620 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0191.title: IBM Lotus Expeditor access control mechanism security bypass
CVE-2012-0191.body: IBM Lotus Expeditor could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the access control mechanism. By spoofing request headers sent to the Expeditor Web container, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the system.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1575642 or 1599620 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0192.title: IBM Lotus Symphony vclmi.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0192.body: IBM Lotus Symphony is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking in the vclmi.dll module. By persuading a victim to open a .doc file containing a specially-crafted embedded graphic object, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1578684 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0195.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management Start Center Layout and Configuration cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0195.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in Start Center Layout and Configuration. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the display name in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1584666 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0199.title: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Software Distribution multiple SQL injection
CVE-2012-0199.body: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Software Distribution is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the GetAttachmentServlet, logon.do, register.do, addAsset.do, SoapServlet, or CallHomeExec servlets or via a specially-crafted EG2 file using various parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.There is no replacement for IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Inventory (5724-N88) and IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express for Software (5724-N89) Distribution. However a follow-on product, IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager for Lifecycle Management v8.1 (5725-C43), is available. Tradeup part numbers are available from the IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager Express products for customers who are currently licensed. For more information on the specific ordering information for the tradeups to the follow-on IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager for Lifecycle Management product, refer to Software Letter 211-048, dated January 25, 2011.

CVE-2012-0201.title: IBM Personal Communications pcspref.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0201.body: IBM Personal Communications is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by pcspref.dll. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted WorkStation (.ws) file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of IBM Personal Communications (6.0.4 or later), available from the IBM Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0202.title: IBM Cognos tm1admsd.exe multiple buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0202.body: IBM Cognos is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the tm1admsd.exe binary. By sending a specially-crafted packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.For IBM Cognos Express: Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1590314 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM Cognos TM1: Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1592222 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0203.title: IBM Infosphere Metadata Workbench cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0203.body: IBM InfoSphere Metadata Workbench is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1623501 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0210.title: The Debian devscripts package .dsc code execution
CVE-2012-0210.body: The Debian devscripts package could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper validation of input when processing malicious .dsc and change files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system and possibly obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Debian devscripts package (2.11.4 or later), available from the Debian Web site. See References. Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-0212.title: The Debian devscripts package debdiff code execution
CVE-2012-0212.body: The Debian devscripts package could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when passing a specially-named file as argument to debdiff. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject arguments of external commands to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Debian devscripts package (2.11.4 or later), available from the Debian Web site. See References. Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-0220.title: ikiwiki unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0220.body: ikiwiki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of ikiwiki (3.20120516 or later), available from the ikiwiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0227.title: ComponentOne FlexGrid ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0227.body: The ComponentOne FlexGrid ActiveX control (VSFlex7.VSFlexGrid) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes overly long string arguments, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-0230.title: GE Proficy Plant Applications PRRDS.exe code execution
CVE-2012-0230.body: GE Proficy Plant Applications could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in PRRDS.exe. By sending a specially-crafted packet to TCP port 12299, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to GE Proficy Plant Web Site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0246.title: IntegraXor ActiveX control directory traversal
CVE-2012-0246.body: The IntegraXor ActiveX control (igcom.dll) could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by the use of an insecure method. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory traversal sequences to overwrite arbitrary files and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of IntegraXor (3.71.4200 or later), available from the Ecava Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0253.title: Pluck SiteLife Direct/Process, Direct/jsonp.htm and sys/jsonp.app/.htm cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0253.body: Pluck SiteLife is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Direct/Process, Direct/jsonp.htm and sys/jsonp.app/.htm scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the jsonRequest, r and cb parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Pluck SiteLife (5.0.13 or later), available from the Pluck Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0259.title: ImageMagick JPEG EXIF denial of service
CVE-2012-0259.body: ImageMagick is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing a JPEG file with invalid EXIF XResolution tag. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG image file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of ImageMagick (6.7.6-4 or later), available from the ImageMagick Web Site. See References.

CVE-2012-0266.title: NTR ActiveX control Download() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0266.body: The NTR ActiveX control. is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the insecure Download() or DownloadModule() method using the bstrUrl parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of NTR ActiveX control (2.0.4.8 or later), available from the NTRglobal Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0266.title: NTR ActiveX control Check buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0266.body: The NTR ActiveX control. is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the insecure Check() method using the bstrParams parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of NTR ActiveX control (2.0.4.8 or later), available from the NTRglobal Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0266.title: NTR ActiveX control StartModule() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0266.body: The NTR ActiveX control. is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the insecure StartModule() method using the bstrUrl parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of NTR ActiveX control (2.0.4.8 or later), available from the NTRglobal Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0267.title: NTR ActiveX control StopModule() code execution
CVE-2012-0267.body: The NTR ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string argument to the StopModule() method using the IModule parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to dereference an arbitrary value and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of NTR ActiveX control (2.0.4.8 or later), available from the NTRglobal Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0273.title: MinaliC retrieve_physical_file_name_or_brows() function response.c buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0273.body: MinaliC is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the retrieve_physical_file_name_or_brows() function in src/response.c script when parsing the file names. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-0356.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module PIM denial of service
CVE-2012-0356.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) and other products are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) messages. By sending a specially-crafted PIM message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120314-fwsm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0358.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0358.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances (ASA) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Cisco Port Forwarder ActiveX Control (cscopf.ocx). By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20120314-asaclient for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0381.title: Cisco IOS IKE packet denial of service
CVE-2012-0381.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Internet Key Exchange (IKE) feature. By sending a specially-crafted IKE packet using UDP ports 500, 848, 4500, or 4848, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120328-ike for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0383.title: Cisco IOS Network Address Translation feature denial of service
CVE-2012-0383.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Network Address Translation (NAT) feature. By sending a specially-crafted SIP packet that require translation, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120328-nat for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0385.title: Cisco IOS Smart Install denial of service
CVE-2012-0385.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Smart Install feature. By sending a specially-crafted packet to TCP port 4786, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120328-smartinstall for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0386.title: Cisco IOS SSHv2 denial of service
CVE-2012-0386.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SSHv2 feature. By attempting a reverse SSH login with a specially-crafted username, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120328-ssh for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0387.title: Cisco IOS HTTP Inspection engine denial of service
CVE-2012-0387.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the HTTP Inspection engine. By sending a specially-crafted message that transits the device, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120328-zbfw for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0388.title: Cisco IOS H.323 messages denial of service
CVE-2012-0388.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the H.323 inspection feature. By sending specially-crafted H.323 messages that transits the device, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120328-zbfw for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0389.title: MailEnable Products ForgottenPassword.aspx cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0389.body: MailEnable Products is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ForgottenPassword.aspx script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Username parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of MailEnable 5.53 or 6.03 or later, available from the MailEnable Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0396.title: EMC Documentum xPlore information disclosure
CVE-2012-0396.body: EMC Documentum xPlore could allow a remote authenticated attacker who does not have BROWSE permission to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct an xPlore search to view certain metadata.Refer to ESA-2012-010 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0400.title: RSA enVision excessive authentication attempts brute force
CVE-2012-0400.body: RSA enVision fails to properly restrict excessive authentication attempts. This makes it easier for an attacker to gain access to the system using brute force techniques.Refer to ESA-2012-014 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0401.title: RSA enVision unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2012-0401.body: RSA enVision is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using an unspecfied parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to ESA-2012-014 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0403.title: RSA enVision unspecified directory traversal
CVE-2012-0403.body: RSA enVision could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing directory traversal sequences to view arbitrary files on the system.Refer to ESA-2012-014 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0440.title: Bugzilla jsonrpc.cgi cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-0440.body: Bugzilla is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the jsonrpc.cgi script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla (3.4.14 or 3.6.8 or 4.0.4 or 4.2 rc2 or later), available from the Bugzilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0444.title: Multiple Mozilla products nsChildView class code execution
CVE-2012-0444.body: Multiple Mozilla products including Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the nsChildView class. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Ogg Vorbis file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to MFSA 2012-07 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0445.title: Multiple Mozilla products iframe element security bypass
CVE-2012-0445.body: Multiple Mozilla products including Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks. By replacing a sub-frame in another domain's document by using the name attribute of the sub-frame as a form submission target an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass HTML5 frame navigation policy.Refer to MFSA 2012-03 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0446.title: Multiple Mozilla products XPConnect cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0446.body: Multiple Mozilla products including Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by frame scripts bypassing XPConnect security checks when calling untrusted objects. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to MFSA 2012-05 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0447.title: Multiple Mozilla products mImageBufferSize information disclosure
CVE-2012-0447.body: Multiple Mozilla products including Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when encoding icon images related to mImageBufferSize in the encoder being initialized with a value different than the size of a source image. By viewing a specially-crafted image, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain information in uninitialized memory during an ICO to PNG image conversion.Refer to MFSA 2012-06 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0448.title: Mozilla Bugzilla unspecified spoofing
CVE-2012-0448.body: Mozilla Bugzilla could allow a remote attacker conduct spoofing attacks, caused by an error in validation of email addresses containing UTF-8 encoded characters. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to impersonate another user account and possibly launch further attacks on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla (3.4.14 or 3.6.8 or 4.0.4 or 4.2 rc2 or later), available from the Bugzilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0449.title: Multiple Mozilla products XSLT stylesheet code execution
CVE-2012-0449.body: Multiple Mozilla products including Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted embedded XSLT stylesheet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to MFSA 2012-08 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0450.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey Recovery Key.html information disclosure
CVE-2012-0450.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive infomation, caused by insecure permissions being set on expored Firefox Sync keys when running on Linux or OS X. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain information from the Recovery Key.html file.Refer to MFSA 2012-09 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0475.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey WebSocket security bypass
CVE-2012-0475.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper construction of the Origin and Sec-WebSocket-Origin HTTP headers. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a cross-site XMLHttpRequest or WebSocket operation involving a nonstandard port number and an IPv6 address to bypass IPv6 literals.Refer to MFSA 2012-28 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-0477.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey ISO-2022-KR cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0477.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ISO-2022-KR or ISO-2022-CN character set to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to MFSA 2012-29 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-0478.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper restrictions of JSVAL_TO_OBJECT casts by the texImage2D() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause the application to crash.Refer to MFSA 2012-30 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-0585.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to prevent the recording of visits by the Private Browsing feature in Safari. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the pushState or replaceState JavaScript methods to bypass privacy settings and insert history entries.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. CVE-2012-0706.title: IBM SONAS LDAP credentials information disclosure
CVE-2012-0706.body: IBM Scale Out Network Attached Storage (SONAS) could allow a local authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storage of LDAP administrator credentials in plaintext. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the affected directory server and clients.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin S1004292 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0707.title: IBM WebSphere Lombardi Edition coach cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0707.body: IBM WebSphere Lombardi Edition is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied when a coach is used with a document attachment control. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM APAR IC79890 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0708.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest ActiveX control (cqole.dll) buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0708.body: IBM Rational ClearQuest ActiveX control (cqole.dll) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by a function prototype mismatch in the RegisterSchemaRepoFromFileByDbSet() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1591705 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0710.title: IBM DB2 DRDA denial of service
CVE-2012-0710.body: IBM DB2 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error related to the Distributed Relational Database Architecture (DRDA). By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the database server to crash.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1588090 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0711.title: IBM DB2 db2dasrrm buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0711.body: IBM DB2 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by a signedness error in the db2dasrrm process. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with DAS privileges or cause the database server to crash.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1588093 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0712.title: IBM DB2 XML feature denial of service
CVE-2012-0712.body: IBM DB2 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused an error in the XML feature. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the XMLPARSE function containing a specially-crafted character string expression to cause an infinite loop condition.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1588098 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0714.title: Multiple IBM products Web interface cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-0714.body: Multiple IBM products are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Web interface. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1610081 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0719.body: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ScheduleParam parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager (8.2.1175 or 8.2 patch 3 or later), available from the IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0720.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Integration Solution Console cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0720.body: WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Integration Solution Console. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1595172 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0723.title: IBM AIX bos.rte.tty and bos.rte.libc denial of service
CVE-2012-0723.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused missing sanity checks in the bos.rte.tty and bos.rte.libc libraries. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a specially-crafted system call to cause the system to crash.Refer to the IBM SECURITY ADVISORY for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0724.title: Adobe Flash Player Chrome code execution
CVE-2012-0724.body: Adobe Flash Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the Chrome interface. By persuading a victim to view malicious content, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code.Refer to APSB12-07 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0726.title: IBM Tivoli Directory Server NULL cipher weak security
CVE-2012-0726.body: IBM Tivoli Directory Server could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the use of NULL-MD5 and NULL-SHA ciphers in the default Transport Layer Security (TLS) configuration. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1591272 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0727.title: Multiple IBM products configure utility SQL injection
CVE-2012-0727.body: Multiple IBM products are vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the configure utility, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1610081 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0728.title: Multiple IBM products LDAP synchronization SQL injection
CVE-2012-0728.body: Multiple IBM products are vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the LDAP synchronization utility, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1610081 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0730.title: AppScan Enterprise multiple cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-0730.body: AppScan Enterprise is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to create administrative accounts on the AppScan Enterprise server.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1592188 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0731.title: AppScan Enterprise configuration information disclosure
CVE-2012-0731.body: AppScan Enterprise could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error during certain configurations. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary files from the system.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1592188 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0732.title: AppScan Enterprise Console client spoofing
CVE-2012-0732.body: AppScan Enterprise could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by a failure to perform SSL certificate validation by the Enterprise Console client. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to launch further attacks against the victim.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1592188 and 1598423 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0735.title: AppScan Enterprise FILE URI information disclosure
CVE-2012-0735.body: AppScan Enterprise could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when scanning FILE URIs. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to launch further attacks against the victim.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1592188 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0736.title: AppScan Enterprise platform authentication code execution
CVE-2012-0736.body: AppScan Enterprise could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when creating scan jobs under certain configurations. By persuading a victim to scan a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on targeted systems.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1592188 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0737.title: AppScan Enterprise cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0737.body: AppScan Enterprise is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1592188 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-0738.title: IBM Security AppScan Enterprise scan spoofing
CVE-2012-0738.body: IBM Security AppScan Enterprise and Rational Policy Tester could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by a failure to perform SSL certificate validation during scans. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to read, inject, or modify transmitted data.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-0740.title: IBM Tivoli Directory Server Web Admin Tool cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0740.body: IBM Tivoli Directory Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Web Admin Tool. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Support and Downloads for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-0741.title: IBM Security AppScan Enterprise Manual Explore Proxy spoofing
CVE-2012-0741.body: IBM Security AppScan Enterprise and Rational Policy Tester could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by a failure to perform SSL certificate validation when viewing a Web site with the Manual Explore Proxy feature. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to read transmitted data.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-0742.title: IBM Tivoli Event Pump AOPSCLOG information disclosure
CVE-2012-0742.body: IBM Tivoli Event Pump could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information, caused by the logging of user related information (userid and password) into AOPSCLOG (AOPLOG) data set if options VALIDATE_SOAP_USERS and LOG_REQUESTS set to YES. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain user credentials.Refer to IBM APAR OA38586 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0744.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest installation scripts information disclosure
CVE-2012-0744.body: Rational ClearQuest could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper access controls on certain post-installation sample scripts. CVE-2012-0745.body: AIX could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the getpwnam() function when customer extended LDAP user filtering is configured. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain lateral or elevated privileges on the system.Refer to IBM APAR IV18464, IV18637, or IV19077 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-0746.body: Multiple IBM products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Attach Web Page and Add New Web Page features. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the URL field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1610081 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0748.title: Rational Team Concert services cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-0748.body: Rational Team Concert is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in certain services. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to modify work items the victim has permission to edit.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1612356 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-0761.body: Adobe Shockwave Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the Shockwave 3D Asset component. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Shockwave file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB12-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-0762.body: Adobe Shockwave Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the Shockwave 3D Asset component. CVE-2012-0765.title: Adobe RoboHelp output cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0765.body: Adobe RoboHelp is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input related to generated web-based output. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2012-0777.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader JavaScript API code execution
CVE-2012-0777.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the JavaScript API. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB12-08 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-0780.title: Adobe Illustrator unspecified code execution
CVE-2012-0780.body: Adobe Illustrator could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified memory corruption error. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Refer to APSB12-10 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0805.title: SQLAlchemy select() SQL injection
CVE-2012-0805.body: SQLAlchemy is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the select() function using the limit or offset parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of SQLAlchemy (0.7.0 or later), available from the SQLAlchemy Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0815.title: RPM Package Manager headerVerifyInfo() code execution
CVE-2012-0815.body: RPM Package Manager could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by incorrect handling of negated offsets in the headerVerifyInfo() function. By persuading a victim to interact with a specially-crafted RPM file via an application that utilizes the RPM library, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the affected application to crash.Refer to RHSA-2012-0451 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-0818.title: RESTEasy XML information disclosure
CVE-2012-0818.body: RESTEasy could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when processing XML data. By sending specially-crafted XML data, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain contents of local files and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of RESTEasy (2.3.1 or later), available from the RESTEasy Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0829.title: Mibew Messenger web interface ban.php and settings.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-0829.body: Mibew Messenger is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ban.php and settings.php scripts. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP requests to address, threadid, geolinkparams, title and chattitle. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-0830.title: PHP php_register_variable_ex() code execution
CVE-2012-0830.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the php_register_variable_ex() function when hashing form posts and updating a hash table. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.3.10 or later), available from the The PHP Group Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0831.title: PHP magic_quotes_gpc security bypass
CVE-2012-0831.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper validation of input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the magic_quotes_gpc directive to bypass security restrictions to launch further attacks on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.3.10 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0840.title: Apache APR hash denial of service
CVE-2012-0840.body: Apache APR is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by insufficient randomization of hash data structures. By sending multiple specially-crafted HTTP POST requests to an affected application containing conflicting hash key values, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache APR (1.4.6 or later), available from the XXXX Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0848.title: FFmpeg ws_snd_decode_frame buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0848.body: FFmpeg is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ws_snd_decode_frame function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted media file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of FFmpeg (0.9.1 or later), available from the FFmpeg Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0849.title: FFmpeg ff_j2k_dwt_init denial of service
CVE-2012-0849.body: FFmpeg is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an integer overflow in the ff_j2k_dwt_init function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG2000 image file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of FFmpeg (0.9.1 or later), available from the FFmpeg Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0850.title: FFmpeg sbr_qmf_synthesis denial of service
CVE-2012-0850.body: FFmpeg is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the sbr_qmf_synthesis function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted mpg file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of FFmpeg (0.9.1 or later), available from the FFmpeg Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0897.title: IrfanView QCD buffer overflow
CVE-2012-0897.body: IrfanView is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the JPEG2000 plug-in when processing the Quantization Default (QCD) marker segment. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG2000 file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of IrfanView (4.33 or later), available from the IrfanView Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-0898.title: WordPress myEASYbackup plugin meb_download.php directory traversal
CVE-2012-0898.body: WordPress myEASYbackup plugin could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the meb_download.php script containing dot dot sequences (/../) in the dwn_file parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-0899.title: Annuaire PHP sites_inscription.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-0899.body: Annuaire PHP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the sites_inscription.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the url parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG2000 file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PhotoLine (17.02 or later), available from the PhotoLine Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1056.title: Drupal Forward Module multiple blocks security bypass
CVE-2012-1056.body: Drupal Forward Module could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of access permissions by Recent forwards and Most forwarded blocks. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using Dynamic Block feature to bypass security restrictions to view the node titles and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable application.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2012-016 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1057.title: Drupal Forward Module unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-1057.body: Drupal Forward Module is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by an unspecified script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CORE-2012-016 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1058.title: Flyspray index.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-1058.body: Flyspray is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to add admin account . An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1059.title: osCommerce index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1059.body: osCommerce is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Cart field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1061.title: GForge Advanced Server unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2012-1061.body: GForge Advanced Server is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to an unspecified script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of GForge Advanced Server (6.0.1 or later), available from the GForge Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1062.title: ManageEngine Applications Manager multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1062.body: ManageEngine Applications Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1063.title: ManageEngine Applications Manager AlarmView.do and showHistoryData.do SQL injection
CVE-2012-1063.body: ManageEngine Applications Manager is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the AlarmView.do and showHistoryData.do scripts using the viewId and period parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1145.title: Red Hat Network Satellite Server NULL security bypass
CVE-2012-1145.body: Red Hat Network Satellite Server could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper checking within the spacewalk-backend when handling a NULL organization. By uploading arbitrary packages, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume disk space in the partition (/var/) and prevent the downloading of updates.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-1146.title: Linux Kernel memcg denial of service
CVE-2012-1146.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference when memcg unregisters events that were attached to the same eventfd. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2012-1167.title: JBoss Enterprise JACC security bypass
CVE-2012-1167.body: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform and Web Platform could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by users being granted access without checking their roles by the WebPermissionMapping class. If configured to use JaccAuthorizationRealm, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to applications without providing proper authentication.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-1176.title: FriBidi Python binding utf-8 buffer overflow
CVE-2012-1176.body: FriBidi Python binding (pyfribidi) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when 4-byte utf-8 sequences. By sending a specially-crafted UTF-8 string sequence, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-1180.title: nginx ngx_cpystrn() information disclosure
CVE-2012-1180.body: nginx could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the ngx_cpystrn() function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the contents of previously freed memory via a malformed HTTP response headers.Upgrade to the latest version of nginx (1.1.17 or later), available from the nginx Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1184.title: Asterisk ast_parse_digest() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-1184.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ast_parse_digest() function. By sending an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to AST-2012-003 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1185.title: ImageMagick profile.c code execution
CVE-2012-1185.body: ImageMagick could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, due to an incomplete fix for an error related to multiple integer overflows in magick/profile.c or magick/property.c. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image file containing malicious offset value in the ResolutionUnit tag in the EXIF IFD0, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Refer to ImageMagick Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-1190.title: phpMyAdmin replication.js cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1190.body: phpMyAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the replication.js script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted database name to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to PMASA-2012-1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1195.title: Lenovo ThinkManagement Console ServerSetup file upload
CVE-2012-1195.body: Lenovo ThinkManagement Console could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the failure to restrict access to specific SOAP based operations by the ServerSetup Web service. By using the PutUpdateFileCore command, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious file to the Web root, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1196.title: Lenovo ThinkManagement Console VulCore directory traversal
CVE-2012-1196.body: Lenovo ThinkManagement Console could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by the VulCore Web service when processing specific SOAP-based operations. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing directory traversal sequences in the filename parameter to delete arbitrary files from the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1197.title: ACDSee BMP image buffer overflow
CVE-2012-1197.body: ACDSee is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the IDE_ACDStd.apl module. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted BMP image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1198.title: BASE base_ag_main.php security bypass
CVE-2012-1198.body: BASE could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication by base_ag_main.php script. By modifying the ag_action parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1219.title: freelancerKit ticket, title and task parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1219.body: freelancerKit is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the tickets.php, notes.php and todo.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ticket, title and task fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1220.title: GAzie admin_utente.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-1220.body: GAzie is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin_utente.php script.
