CVE-2012-1294.body: Impulsio CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1296.title: Elefant CMS preview.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1296.body: Elefant CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the preview.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the layout, title, window_title, and body fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1297.title: Contao newsletter cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-1297.body: Contao is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the main.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to delete a user, delete news, or delete a newsletter. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1312.title: Cisco IOS MACE denial of service
CVE-2012-1312.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Measurement, Aggregation, and Correlation Engine (MACE) feature. By sending a specially-crafted message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120328-mace for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1314.title: Cisco IOS WAAS denial of service
CVE-2012-1314.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Wide Area Application Services (WAAS) Express feature. By sending a specially-crafted message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to leak memory or reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120328-mace for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1315.title: Cisco IOS SIP inspection denial of service
CVE-2012-1315.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SIP inspection feature. By sending a specially-crafted SIP message that transits the device, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20120328-zbfw for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1328.title: Cisco Unified IP Phones 9900 series RT privilege escalation
CVE-2012-1328.body: Cisco Unified IP Phones 9900 series could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper handling of downloads of configuration information to an RT phone. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1337.title: WebEx Business Suite WRF file buffer overflow
CVE-2012-1337.body: WebEx Business Suite is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted WRF file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20120404-webex for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1414.title: Plume CMS news.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-1414.body: Plume CMS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the news.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to insert and publish "News". An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1417.title: Yealink VOIP Phone multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1417.body: Yealink VOIP Phone is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using several fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1426.title: Multiple Antivirus POSIX TAR file evasion
CVE-2012-1426.body: Multiple antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to evade protection mechanisms, caused by an error when parsing certain file types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted POSIX TAR file containing "\42\5A\68" as first 3 bytes, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1427.title: Multiple Antivirus Products POSIX TAR file evasion
CVE-2012-1427.body: Multiple antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to evade protection mechanisms, caused by an error when parsing certain file types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted POSIX TAR file containing "\57\69\6E\5A\69\70" at offset 29, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1428.title: Multiple Antivirus Products POSIX TAR file evasion
CVE-2012-1428.body: Multiple antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to evade protection mechanisms, caused by an error when parsing certain file types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted POSIX TAR file containing "\4a\46\49\46" at offset 6, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1457.title: Multiple Antivirus Products TAR file length field evasion
CVE-2012-1457.body: Multiple antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to evade protection mechanisms, caused by an error when parsing certain file types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted TAR file header containing length field greater than the original length, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-1459.title: Multiple Antivirus TAR file header evasion
CVE-2012-1459.body: Multiple antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to evade protection mechanisms, caused by an error when parsing certain file types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted TAR file containing multiple files having length field in header of clean file pointing to the header field of infected file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-1460.title: Multiple Antivirus Products tar.gz file gzip evasion
CVE-2012-1460.body: Multiple antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to evade protection mechanisms, caused by an error when parsing certain file types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted tar.gz file appended with 6 random bytes at the end, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1462.title: Multiple Antivirus ZIP file evasion
CVE-2012-1462.body: Multiple antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to evade protection mechanisms, caused by an error when parsing certain file types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ZIP file prepended with 1024 random bytes, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1463.title: Multiple Antivirus Products ELF file evasion
CVE-2012-1463.body: Multiple antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to evade protection mechanisms, caused by an error when parsing certain file types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ELF file containing 5th byte set to 02, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1464.title: NetDecision information disclosure
CVE-2012-1464.body: NetDecision could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper validation of requests. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request for any known file appended with a "?" character, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the Web script physical path and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of NetDecision (4.6.1 or later), available from the NetDecision Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1465.title: NetDecision HTTP request denial of service
CVE-2012-1465.body: NetDecision is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a stack-based buffer overflow when handling web requests. By sending an overly long HTTP request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer to cause the service to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of NetDecision (4.6.1 or later), available from the NetDecision Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1469.title: Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems editor cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1469.body: Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the lib/pkp/lib/tinymce/jscripts/tiny_mce/plugins/ibrowser/ibrowser.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the editor or callback parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Open Journal Systems (2.3.7 or later), available from the Public Knowledge Project Web Site. See References.

CVE-2012-1469.title: Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems string cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1469.body: Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the String::stripUnsafeHtml() function within lib/pkp/classes/core/String.inc.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Open Journal Systems (2.3.7 or later), available from the Public Knowledge Project Web Site. See References.

CVE-2012-1469.title: Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1469.body: Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems (2.3.7 or later), available from the Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1469.title: Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems articleId cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1469.body: Public Knowledge Project Open Journal Systems is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when handling submissions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the articleId parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Open Journal Systems (2.3.7 or later), available from the Public Knowledge Project Web Site. See References.

CVE-2012-1498.title: Webfolio CMS Add Administrator and Modify Web Page cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-1498.body: Webfolio CMS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to add an administrator or modify web page. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1502.title: PyPAM password denial of service
CVE-2012-1502.body: PyPAM is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference when processing passwords containing NULL bytes. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-1503.title: Movable Type Mt5.13en installation cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1503.body: Movable Type is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in the Mt5.13en installation. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the comment section field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-1506.body: OrangeHRM is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the haltResumeHsp.php script using the hspSummaryid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of OrangeHRM (2.7 or later), available from the OrangeHRM Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1507.body: OrangeHRM is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the haltResumeHsp.php, emppop.php and index.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the newHspStatus, sortOrder and uri parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of OrangeHRM (2.7 or later), available from the OrangeHRM Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1509.title: VMware View XPDM privilege escalation
CVE-2012-1509.body: VMware View could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a buffer overflow in the XPDM display driver. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system.Refer to VMSA-2012-0005 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1510.title: VMware View WDDM privilege escalation
CVE-2012-1510.body: VMware View could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a buffer overflow in the WDDM display driver. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system.Refer to VMSA-2012-0005 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1512.title: VMware vSphere Client cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1512.body: VMware vSphere Client is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when viewing a specific log entry. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to VMSA-2012-0005 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1513.title: VMware vCenter Orchestrator Configuration tool information disclosure
CVE-2012-1513.body: VMware vCenter Orchestrator could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the vCenter Orchestrator Web Configuration tool. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the password of the vCenter Server.Refer to VMSA-2012-0005 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1514.title: VMWare vShield Manager cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-1514.body: VMWare vShield Manager is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to VMSA-2012-0005 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1515.title: VMware ESX Server and ESXi I/O privilege escalation
CVE-2012-1515.body: Microsoft Windows, when running as a guest operating system on VMware ESX Server or ESXi, could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by an error when handling port-based I/O. By modifying Read-Only Memory that belongs to the Virtual DOS Machine, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite ROM to gain elevated privileges.Refer to VMSA-2012-0006 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For Microsoft: Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS12-042. See References.

CVE-2012-1516.title: VMware ESX Server and ESXi RPC privilege escalation
CVE-2012-1516.body: VMware ESX Server and ESXi could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the handler function for RPC commands. A local attacker on the guest operating system could exploit this vulnerability to crash the VMX process and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Refer to VMSA-2012-0009 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1517.title: VMware ESX Server and ESXi RPC commands privilege escalation
CVE-2012-1517.body: VMware ESX Server and ESXi could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the handler function for RPC commands. A local attacker on the guest operating system could exploit this vulnerability to crash the VMX process and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Refer to VMSA-2012-0009 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1521.title: Google Chrome xml parser code execution
CVE-2012-1521.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free within xml parser. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (18.0.1025.168 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1529.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer onMove() code execution
CVE-2012-1529.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free vulnerability in the onMove() function. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2012-1556.title: Synology Photo Station photo_one.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1556.body: Synology Photo Station is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the photo_one.php script. CVE-2012-1557.body: An unspecified error in Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Plesk Panel (8.6 MU#2, 9.5 MU#11, 10.3 MU#5 or later), available from the Parallels Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1564.title: YVS Image Gallery create_album.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1564.body: YVS Image Gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the create_album.php script. CVE-2012-1575.body: Cumin and Red Hat Enterprise MRG Management Console are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2012-1580.body: MediaWiki is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by Special:Upload. CVE-2012-1843.body: Quantum Scalar i500 and Dell PowerVault ML6000 are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2012-1899.body: Webfolio CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the webfolio/admin/users/edit page. CVE-2012-1928.title: Opera redirects spoofing
CVE-2012-1928.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by an error when handling redirects to a slowly responding target site. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and displaying the current URL in the address bar, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (11.62 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1929.title: Opera dialogs spoofing
CVE-2012-1929.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by an error when displaying certain dialogs. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and displaying the current URL in the address bar, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (11.62 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1930.title: Opera printing information disclosure
CVE-2012-1930.body: Opera could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the use of world-readable permissions for temporary files during printing. By reading these files, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (11.62 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1931.title: Opera printing symlink
CVE-2012-1931.body: Opera could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack, caused by an error when used in conjunction with an unspecified printing application. Temporary files are created insecurely. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file during printing to various files on the system, which could allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (11.62 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1933.title: Sourcefabric Newscoop GLOBALS[g_campsiteDir] parameter file include
CVE-2012-1933.body: Sourcefabric Newscoop could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the multiple scripts using the GLOBALS[g_campsiteDir] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Newscoop (3.5.5 or 4 RC4 or later), available from the Newscoop Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1935.title: Newscoop multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-1935.body: Newscoop is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ad.php, password_check_token.php and login.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Back, error_code, token, f_email and f_user_name parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Newscoop (3.5.5 or 4 RC4 or later), available from the Newscoop Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1986.title: Puppet REST symlink
CVE-2012-1986.body: Puppet could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack, caused by the improper handling of REST requests for a file from a remote filebucket. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file to various files on the system, which could allow the attacker to read files from the puppet master’s user account.Upgrade to the latest version of Puppet (2.5.1, 2.7.13, or 2.6.15 or later), available from the Puppet Labs Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1989.title: Puppet NET::Telnet symlink
CVE-2012-1989.body: Puppet could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack. The output log for NET::Telnet is created insecurely. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file to various files on the system, which could allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Puppet (2.5.1, 2.7.13, or 2.6.15 or later), available from the Puppet Labs Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1994.title: HP Systems Insight Manager unauthorized access
CVE-2012-1994.body: An unspecified error in HP Systems Insight Manager could allow a remote attacker gain unauthorized access to the system.Refer to HPSBMU02769 SSRT100846 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2001.title: HP SNMP Agents unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2001.body: HP SNMP Agents is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to HPSBMU02771 SSRT100558 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2002.title: HP SNMP Agents URL redirection
CVE-2012-2002.body: An unspecified error in HP SNMP Agents could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.Refer to HPSBMU02771 SSRT100558 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2003.title: HP Insight Management Agents unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-2003.body: HP Insight Management Agents is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to HPSBMU02770 SSRT100848 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2004.title: HP Insight Management Agents unspecified URL redirection
CVE-2012-2004.body: An unspecified error in HP Insight Management Agents could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.Refer to HPSBMU02770 SSRT100848 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-2005.body: HP Insight Management Agents is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to HPSBMU02770 SSRT100848 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-2010.title: HP OpenVMS ACMELOGIN privilege escalation
CVE-2012-2010.body: HP OpenVMS could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in ACMELOGIN. If SYS$ACM system service for authentication is enabled, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system.Refer to HPSBOV02780 SSRT100766 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2023.title: Adobe Illustrator unspecified code execution
CVE-2012-2023.body: Adobe Illustrator could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified memory corruption error. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Refer to APSB12-10 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-2026.body: Adobe Illustrator is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in JPEGFormat.aip when calculating the size of a buffer. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB12-10 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-2053.title: Firepass sudoers file privilege escalation
CVE-2012-2053.body: Firepass could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the lack of a password for executing commands as root by the sudoers file in the Linux system configuration. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerabilty using the sudo program to gain elevated privileges on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2081.body: Organic Groups module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper verification of user access to group contents by the Views module. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view and access group titles and contents for other groups using unknown attack vectors.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-053 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2094.title: OpenStack Dashboard horizon.js cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2094.body: OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the horizon.js script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the guest console to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to OSSA 2012-006 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2098.title: Apache Commons Compress and Apache Ant bzip2 denial of service
CVE-2012-2098.body: Apache Commons Compress and Apache Ant are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when using bzip2 compression to compress files. By passing specially-crafted input to the BZip2CompressorOutputStream class, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available resources.For Apache Commons Compress: Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Commons Compress (1.4.1 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References. For Apache Ant: Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Ant (1.8.4 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-2104.title: Munin munin-cgi-graph.log command execution
CVE-2012-2104.body: Munin could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary strings and escape sequences into the munin-cgi-graph.log to execute arbitrary commands on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2105.title: Timesheet Next Gen login.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-2105.body: Timesheet Next Gen is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the username and password parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2156.title: PlumeCMS users.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2156.body: PlumeCMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the users.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the u_email, u_realname and c_author fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2159.title: IBM Eclipse Help System multiple products open redirect
CVE-2012-2159.body: Multiple IBM products could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by an open redirect vulnerability in the Eclipse Help System. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2012-2162.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server plugin-key.kdb spoofing
CVE-2012-2162.body: The WebSphere Application Server Plug-in could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the use of a default password expiration date in plugin-key.kdb password manager file. After expiration of the password on April 26, 2012 and following a restart of the WebSphere Plugin or modification of the plugin-cfg.xml file, SSL communication will fail. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to read, inject or modify transmitted data. Note: Following expiration of the password, the WebSphere Plug-in will fail to forward incoming requests when HTTP transports have been explicitly disabled, blocked, or removed, resulting in an availability impact under certain configurations.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1591172 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2163.title: IBM SONAS Web GUI and CLI command execution
CVE-2012-2163.body: IBM SONAS could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker with administrative privileges could exploit this vulnerability via the Web GUI or CLI to execute arbitrary shell commands on the system with root privileges.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin S1004170 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2164.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest Site Administration menu security bypass
CVE-2012-2164.body: Rational ClearQuest could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user credentials. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to the Site Administration menu to obtain sensitive information or modify server settings.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1606318 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2165.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest query information disclosure
CVE-2012-2165.body: Rational ClearQuest could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storage of user credentials in an insecure manner when ClearQuest authentication is enabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to query user names and obtain encrypted password hashes.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1606385 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2168.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest stack trace information disclosure
CVE-2012-2168.body: Rational ClearQuest could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a URL request containing an invalid parameter, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to force an exception and return a stack trace.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1606319 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2169.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest File Description cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2169.body: Rational ClearQuest is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by file upload feature. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the File Description field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1607783 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2170.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server snoop servlet information disclosure
CVE-2012-2170.body: WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by missing access controls on the default Application Snoop Servlet when enabled. By sending a direct request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain request and client information.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1595172 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2171.title: IBM System Storage Storage Manager Profiler SQL injection
CVE-2012-2171.body: IBM System Storage is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements via the Manager Profiler, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to the IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2172.title: IBM System Storage Manager Profiler cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2172.body: IBM System Storage is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Manager Profiler. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2174.title: Lotus Notes notes:// URI command execution
CVE-2012-2174.body: Lotus Notes could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user supplied input. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted notes:// URI, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary shell commands.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1598348 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2175.title: Lotus iNotes ActiveX control (dwa85W.dll) buffer overflow
CVE-2012-2175.body: Lotus iNotes ActiveX control (dwa85W.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the Attachment_Times() insecure method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1596862 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2176.title: Lotus Quickr ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2012-2176.body: Lotus Quickr ActiveX control is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the Attachment_Times() or Import_Times() insecure method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1596191 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2177.title: IBM Cognos Business Intelligence cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2177.body: IBM Cognos Business Intelligence (BI) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1626697 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2179.title: AIX libodm.a symlink
CVE-2012-2179.body: AIX could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack, caused by insecure creation of temporary files by libodm.a. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file to various files on the system, which could allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system with elevated privileges.

CVE-2012-2181.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Dojo module directory traversal
CVE-2012-2181.body: IBM WebSphere Portal could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to view arbitrary files on the system and obtain sensitive information. This information could be used to launch further attacks against the affected system.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1598363 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2185.title: Multiple IBM products Launch in Context feature information disclosure
CVE-2012-2185.body: Multiple IBM products could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, cause by the passing of the user name and password as part of Launch in Context URLs. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1610081 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2188.title: IBM Hardware Management Console viosvrcmd command privilege escalation
CVE-2012-2188.body: IBM Hardware Management Console could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a specially-crafted viosvrcmd command argument to execute arbitrary commands on the system with root privileges.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2190.title: Multiple IBM products GSKit client hello message denial of service
CVE-2012-2190.body: Multiple IBM products are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Global Secure ToolKit (GSKit). By sending a specially-crafted TLS Handshake Protocol client hello message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the affected application to crash.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2191.title: Multiple IBM products GSKit SSL/TLS record layer processing denial of service
CVE-2012-2191.body: Multiple IBM products are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an access violation error in GSKit during SSL/TLS record layer processing. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the affected application to crash.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2012-2193.title: IBM Cognos Business Intelligence cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2193.body: IBM Cognos Business Intelligence (BI) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1626697 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2199.title: IBM WebSphere MQ server message channel agent denial of service
CVE-2012-2199.body: WebSphere MQ is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a invalid address alignment exception in the server message channel agent on a Solaris queue manager. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the queue manager to crash.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1610285 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2200.title: IBM AIX sendmail forward file command execution
CVE-2012-2200.body: A vulnerability in the sendmail program in AIX could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. Sendmail improperly handles certain constructs in a user's $HOME/.forward file. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute commands with elevated privileges or cause the server to crash.Refer to the IBM AIX Security Advisory for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2202.title: Proventia Network Mail javatester_init.php directory traversal
CVE-2012-2202.body: Proventia Network Mail could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the javatester_init.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the template parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1605630 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2203.title: Multiple IBM products GSKit spoofing
CVE-2012-2203.body: Multiple IBM products could allow an attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the use of an optional GSKit MacData integrity control. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2205.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest Workspace cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2205.body: Rational ClearQuest is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a workspace query to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1605838 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2206.title: IBM WebSphere MQ File Transfer Edition Web Gateway security bypass
CVE-2012-2206.body: WebSphere MQ could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the use of predictable filespace names. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via man-in-the-middle techniques to gain unauthorized access to user files.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1607481 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2208.title: Piwigo language parameter directory traversal
CVE-2012-2208.body: Piwigo could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the upgrade.php script containing dot dot sequences (/../) in the language parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Piwigo (2.3.4 or later), available from the Piwigo Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2209.title: Piwigo multiple parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2209.body: Piwigo is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the section, theme and installstatus parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Piwigo (2.3.4 or later), available from the Piwigo Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2210.title: Sony BRAVIA TV KDL-32CX525 denial of service
CVE-2012-2210.body: Sony BRAVIA TV KDL-32CX525 is vulnerable to a denial of service. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a datagram flood to cause the device to malfunction.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2215.title: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management PreBoot file download
CVE-2012-2215.body: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management could allow a remote attacker to download arbitrary files, caused by an error in the PreBoot Service. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary files from the system.Refer to Novell Document ID: 7010044 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2217.title: Multiple HTC devices IQRD security bypass
CVE-2012-2217.body: Multiple HTC devices could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the IQRD service. By sending a specially-crafted message, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform unauthorized actions.Refer to HTC Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2223.title: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management xplat agent cross-site tracing
CVE-2012-2223.body: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management is vulnerable to cross-site tracing, caused by the enabling of the HTTP TRACE method by the xplat agent. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the victim's browser to invoke a TRACE request to return sensitive header information including cookies or authentication data from third-party domains.Refer to Novell Document ID: 7010137 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2224.title: Xunlei Thunder DLL code execution
CVE-2012-2224.body: Xunlei Thunder could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted file related to a DLL injection vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Xunlei Thunder (7.2.6 or later), available from the Xunlei Web site Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2225.title: 360zip file code execution
CVE-2012-2225.body: 360zip could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using attack vectors related to file browsing and file extraction to execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2227.title: PluXml index.php File Include
CVE-2012-2227.body: PluXml could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the default_lang parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of PluXml (5.1.6 or later), available from the PluXml Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2230.title: Cloudera Manager taskcontroller.cfg spoofing
CVE-2012-2230.body: Cloudera Manager could allow a remote authenticated attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper installation of taskcontroller.cfg. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker who has Kerberos disabled could exploit this vulnerability to impersonate arbitrary user accounts.Refer to Cloudera Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2234.title: TeamPass users.queries.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2234.body: TeamPass is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the users.queries.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the login field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of TeamPass (2.1.6 or later), available from the TeamPass Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2241.title: Debian devscripts file deletion
CVE-2012-2241.body: Debian devscripts could allow a remote attacker to delete arbitrary files from the system, caused by the improper verification of input by the dget.pl script when processing .dsc or .changes file. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted source package to delete arbitrary files from the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-2246.title: Mahara delete.php clickjacking
CVE-2012-2246.body: Mahara could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim, caused by the failure to prevent deletion of user account by delete.php script. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of Mahara (1.4.5 or 1.5.4 or later), available from the Mahara Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2251.title: rssh e-option command execution
CVE-2012-2251.body: rssh could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper filtering of the -e option when using rsync. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary commands on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of rssh (2.3.4 or later), available from the rssh Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2267.title: RealNetworks Helix Server master.exe denial of service
CVE-2012-2267.body: RealNetworks Helix Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SNMP Master Agent process (master.exe). By establishing and immediately closing a TCP connection on port 705, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to terminate.Upgrade to the latest version of Helix Server (14.3.x or later), available from the RealNetworks Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2270.title: ownCloud index.php open redirect
CVE-2012-2270.body: ownCloud could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by an open redirect vulnerability in the index.php script. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the redirect_url parameter in a specially-crafted URL to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.Upgrade to the latest version of ownCloud (3.0.2 or later), available from the ownCloud Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2275.title: TestLink userinfo.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-2275.body: TestLink is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the userinfo.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of TestLink (1.9.4 or later), available from the TestLink Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2276.title: EMC Documentum Information Rights Management denial of service
CVE-2012-2276.body: EMC Documentum Information Rights Management is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference within the IRM Server. By sending specially-crafted data, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to ESA-2012-019 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2277.title: EMC Documentum Information Rights Management denial of service
CVE-2012-2277.body: EMC Documentum Information Rights Management is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the inclusion of unauthorized repetitive "batch begin untethered" calls. By sending specially-crafted data, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to unresponsive.Refer to ESA-2012-019 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2285.title: EMC Cloud Tiering Appliance GUI security bypass
CVE-2012-2285.body: EMC Cloud Tiering Appliance could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when authenticating as a GUI user. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain full administrative access to the system.Refer to ESA-2012-034 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2287.title: RSA Authentication Agent and RSA Authentication Client security bypass
CVE-2012-2287.body: RSA Authentication Agent and RSA Authentication Client could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the authentication functionality. If an unspecified configuration exists, an attacker could bypass the two-factor authentication step and establish a login session using only their Windows credentials to a remote host.Refer to ESA-2012-037 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2296.title: Janrain Engage module for Drupal weak security
CVE-2012-2296.body: The Janrain Engage module for Drupal could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the storage of complete user profile data returned from the users table. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-056 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2297.title: Creative Commons module for Drupal License Description cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2297.body: Creative Commons module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input related to text describing licenses. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-062 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2298.title: RealName module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2298.body: RealName module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by an unspecified script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-063 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2304.title: Linkit module for Drupal search module security bypass
CVE-2012-2304.body: The Linkit module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions while searching. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the application.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-067 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2308.title: Taxonomy Grid : Catalog module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2308.body: Taxonomy Grid : Catalog module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-070 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2320.title: ConnMan netlink security bypass
CVE-2012-2320.body: ConnMan could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to check the origin of netlink messages. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and launch further attacks on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of ConnMan (0.85 or later), available from the ConnMan Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2322.title: ConnMan DHCP denial of service
CVE-2012-2322.body: ConnMan is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the dhcpv6_get_option() function. By sending specially-crafted DHCP packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to enter into an infinite loop.Upgrade to the latest version of ConnMan (0.85 or later), available from the ConnMan Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2329.title: PHP apache_request_headers() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-2329.body: PHP is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the apache_request_headers() function. By sending an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.4.3 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2333.title: OpenSSL TLS record denial of service
CVE-2012-2333.body: OpenSSL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an integer underflow error when handling CBC mode ciphersuites in TLS records. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted packets to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenSSL (1.0.1c, 1.0.0j, or 0.9.8x or later), available from the OpenSSL Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2012-2334.title: OpenOffice.org PowerPoint denial of service
CVE-2012-2334.body: OpenOffice.org is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by unchecked memory allocation errors within msdffimp.cxx. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PowerPoint file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenOffice.org (3.4 or later), available from the OpenOffice.org Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2335.title: PHP php-wrapper.fcgi code execution
CVE-2012-2335.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of command-line arguments by the php-wrapper.fcgi script. By leveraging improper interaction, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.4.3 or 5.3.13 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2339.title: Glossary module for Drupal taxonomy information cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2339.body: Glossary module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using taxonomy information in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-073 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2341.title: Take Control module for Drupal Ajax calls cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-2341.body: Take Control module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of Ajax calls. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to manipulate files in the Drupal file system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-075 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2370.title: gdk-pixbuf read_bitmap_file_data() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-2370.body: The gdk-pixbuf package is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow within the read_bitmap_file_data() function when processing malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted XBM file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the gdk-pixbuf GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2012-2376.title: PHP com_print_typeinfo function denial of service
CVE-2012-2376.body: PHP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper bounds checking by the com_print_typeinfo function. By sending specially-crafted arguments that trigger incorrect handling of COM object VARIANT types, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.No remedy available as of December 2016.

CVE-2012-2377.title: JBoss JGroups information disclosure
CVE-2012-2377.body: JBoss JGroups diagnostics service is enabled by default with no authentication when a JGroups channel is started. CVE-2012-2702.title: Ubercart Product Keys module for Drupal product keys security bypass
CVE-2012-2702.body: The Ubercart Product Keys module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions.The Ubercart Product Keys module will allow a user to view all unassigned product keys which could lead the attacker to access the software. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the system.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-076 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2703.title: Advertisement module for Drupal settings.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2703.body: Advertisement module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the settings.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the $conf parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-77 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2704.title: Advertisement module for Drupal settings.php information disclosure
CVE-2012-2704.body: Advertisement module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the settings.php script using the $conf parameter. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-77 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2705.title: Smart Breadcrumb module for Drupal filter_titles() function cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2705.body: Smart Breadcrumb module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the filter_titles() function. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the title field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-078 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2706.title: Post Affiliate Pro module for Drupal registration page cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2706.body: Post Affiliate Pro module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the registration page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-079 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2708.title: Hostmaster (Aegir) module for Drupal log messages cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2708.body: Hostmaster (Aegir) module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability while displaying log messages to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-080 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-2711.body: Taxonomy List module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2012-2713.title: BrowserID (Mozilla Persona) module for Drupal authentication cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-2713.body: BrowserID (Mozilla Persona) module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the authentication page. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to login. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-085 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2716.title: Comment Moderation module for Drupal unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-2716.body: Comment Moderation module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-087 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-2717.body: Mobile Tools module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input.
