CVE-2012-2718.title: Counter module for Drupal unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2012-2718.body: Counter module for Drupal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to an unspecified script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-089 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2720.title: Tokenauth module for Drupal user's session security bypass
CVE-2012-2720.body: The Token authentication module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused when the module does not revert the user's session properly. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by performing subsequent requests with additional privileges to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable application.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-091 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2721.title: Organic Groups module for Drupal core permission security bypass
CVE-2012-2721.body: The Organic Groups module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, when accessing content. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable application.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-092 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2722.title: Node Embed module for Drupal select and embed nodes security bypass
CVE-2012-2722.body: The Node Embed module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused when selecting and embedding nodes using the Node Embed WYSIWYG editor. By viewing the node titles, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable application.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-093 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2724.title: Simplenews module for Drupal Simplenews mailing list information disclosure
CVE-2012-2724.body: Simplenews module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the confirmation page which may disclose the user's e-mail address. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view the list of e-mail addresses and obtain other sensitive information.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-095 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2726.title: Protest module for Drupal protest_body parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2726.body: Protest module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the protest_body field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-097 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2727.title: Janrain Capture module for Drupal spoofing
CVE-2012-2727.body: The Janrain Capture module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper verification of input. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed in the address bar to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2012-098 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2728.title: Node Hierarchy module for Drupal unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-2728.body: Node Hierarchy module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2012-099 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2730.title: Protected Node module for Drupal security bypass
CVE-2012-2730.body: The Protected Node module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to properly restrict access when nodes are accessed outside of the standard node view. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to restricted nodes.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2012-101 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2731.title: Ubercart AJAX Cart for Drupal information disclosure
CVE-2012-2731.body: The Ubercart AJAX Cart for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the inclusion of the user's current session ID in one of its JavaScript settings keys on every page load. An attacker with read access to the HTML output of a page could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2012-102 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2734.title: Cumin and Red Hat Enterprise MRG Grid cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-2734.body: Cumin and Red Hat Enterprise MRG Grid are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to execute arbitrary commands on the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Cumin SVN Repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-2746.title: 389 Directory Server logging information disclosure
CVE-2012-2746.body: 389 Directory Server and Red Hat Directory Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of logging to the audit log when changing passwords. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view the password written to the audit log in plaintext and obtain other sensitive information.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-2759.title: Login With Ajax plugin for WordPress login-with-ajax.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2759.body: Login With Ajax plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login-with-ajax.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the JSON callback parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Login With Ajax plugin for WordPress (3.0.4.1 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2760.title: mod_auth_openid database information disclosure
CVE-2012-2760.body: FindingScience mod_auth_openid could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the creation of a database file (/tmp/mod_auth_openid.db) with insecure world-readable permissions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to the openid sessions.Upgrade to the latest version of mod_auth_openid (0.7 or later), available from the FindingScience Web site. See References.

See References.

CVE-2012-2806.body: libjpeg-turbo is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the get_sos() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG image, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of libjpeg-turbo (1.2.1 or later), available from the libjpeg-turbo Web page. See References.

CVE-2012-2901.body: JCE component for Joomla! is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2914.title: Captcha captchademo.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2914.body: Captcha is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the captchademo.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2915.title: PAC-Designer .pac buffer overflow
CVE-2012-2915.body: PAC-Designer is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing the definition tags in files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .pac file containing an overly long string argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2916.title: SABRE plugin for WordPress tools.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2916.body: SABRE plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the tools.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the active_option parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2917.title: Share and Follow plugin for WordPress admin.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2917.body: Share and Follow plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the CDN API parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2918.title: Chevereto upload script index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2918.body: Chevereto upload script is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the txt parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2919.title: Chevereto upload script information disclosure
CVE-2012-2919.body: Chevereto upload script could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the index.php script. A different message is returned when a login attempt is made via an invalid username. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to enumerate logins of the user.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2920.title: User Photo plugin for WordPress options-general.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2920.body: User Photo plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the options-general.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the '$_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']' parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of User Photo (0.9.5.2 or later), available from the User Photo Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2922.title: Drupal index.php path disclsoure
CVE-2012-2922.body: Drupal could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php using q[] parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of Drupal (7.15 or later), available from the Drupal Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2923.title: eLearning Server 4G news.php4 SQL injection
CVE-2012-2923.body: eLearning Server 4G is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the news.php4 script using the nid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2924.title: eLearning Server 4G setup.inc.php file include
CVE-2012-2924.body: eLearning Server 4G could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the setup.inc.php script using the path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2925.title: Simple PHP Agenda engine.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-2925.body: Simple PHP Agenda is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the engine.php script using the priority parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2927.title: Atlassian JIRA XML denial of service
CVE-2012-2927.body: Atlassian JIRA and the Gliffy and Tempo plugins for JIRA are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error related to third-party XML parsers. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Atlassian JIRA (5.0.1 or later), available from the Atlassian JIRA Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-2928.title: Atlassian JIRA XML denial of service
CVE-2012-2928.body: Atlassian JIRA and the Gliffy and Tempo plugins for JIRA are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error related to third-party XML parsers. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Atlassian JIRA (5.0.1 or later), available from the Atlassian JIRA Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-2935.title: OSCommerce Online Merchant main.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2935.body: OSCommerce Online Merchant is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the main.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the value_title parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the osCommerce GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2012-2936.title: Pligg CMS multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2936.body: Pligg CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin_comments.php, admin_links.php, admin_index.php and module.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user, page, list and karma_username parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Pligg CMS (1.2.2 or later), available from the Pligg CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2937.title: Pligg CMS multiple scripts SQL injection
CVE-2012-2937.body: Pligg CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin_index.php, admin_users.php and module.php scripts using the list, display, enabled and msg_id parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Pligg CMS (1.2.2 or later), available from the Pligg CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2940.title: Real-DRAW PRO multiple files denial of service
CVE-2012-2940.body: Real-DRAW PRO is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PNG, WMF, PSD, TGA, TTF, BMP,TIFF and PCX file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2941.title: Yandex.Server text parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2941.body: Yandex.Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the text parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2942.title: HAProxy trash buffer overflow
CVE-2012-2942.body: HAProxy is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when copying data into the trash buffer. If the global.tune.bufsize configuration option is set to a greater value than the default, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of HAProxy (1.4.21 or later), available from the HAProxy Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2944.title: Network UPS Tools addchar() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-2944.body: Network UPS Tools is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the addchar() function. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Network UPS Tools (2.6.4 or later), available from the Network UPS Tools Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2948.title: Asterisk SCCP (Skinny) channel driver denial of service
CVE-2012-2948.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a Null-pointer dereference in the SCCP (Skinny) channel driver. By closing a connection to the Asterisk server in certain call states, a remote attacker with a valid SCCP ID could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to AST-2012-008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2952.title: Jaow CMS add_ons.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-2952.body: Jaow CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the add_ons.php script using the add_ons parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Jaow CMS (2.4.6 or later), available from the Jaow CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2955.title: Proventia Network Mail logs_eventDetails.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-2955.body: Proventia Network Mail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the logs_eventDetails.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the alertID parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1605626 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2956.title: Spiceworks api_v2.json SQL injection
CVE-2012-2956.body: Spiceworks is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the api_v2.json script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2957.title: Symantec Web Gateway authentication mechanism file include
CVE-2012-2957.body: Symantec Web Gateway could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the languageTest.php script using the language parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Refer to SYM12-011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2961.title: Symantec Web Gateway ldap_latest.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-2961.body: Symantec Web Gateway is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to ldap_latest.php script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to SYM12-011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-2962.title: Dell SonicWALL Scrutinizer statusFilter.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-2962.body: Dell SonicWALL Scrutinizer is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the statusFilter.php script using the q parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of SonicWALL Scrutinizer (9.5.2 or later), available from the SonicWALL Scrutinizer Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-2972.title: CA ARCserve Backup RPC denial of service
CVE-2012-2972.body: CA ARCserve Backup is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of RPC requests. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.Refer to CA20121018-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-2993.title: Microsoft Windows Phone 7 domain name spoofing
CVE-2012-2993.body: Microsoft Windows Phone 7 could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by improper validation of the domain name of the X.509 certificate Common Name (CN) field. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof an SSL server for POP3, IMAP, or SMTP protocol communication.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2997.title: F5 BIG-IP XML information disclosure
CVE-2012-2997.body: F5 BIG-IP could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. By sending specially-crafted XML data, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary files from the system and gain unauthorized access to the critical /etc/shadow file and obtain the password hash and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of BIG-IP (11.2.1 HF3 or later), available from the F5 Web Site. See References.

CVE-2012-3000.title: F5 BIG-IP SQL injection
CVE-2012-3000.body: F5 BIG-IP is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the saveSettings.php script using the BIGIPAuthCookie cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of BIG-IP (11.2.1 HF3 or later), available from the F5 Web Site. See References.

CVE-2012-0241.title: BroadWin and Advantech WebAccess stream code execution
CVE-2012-0241.body: BroadWin and Advantech WebAccess could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using stream identifiers to corrupt memory zones to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Advantech Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-1466.title: NetDecision Traffic Grapher Server .nd file source code disclosure
CVE-2012-1466.body: NetDecision Traffic Grapher Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a web request using a specially-crafted GET header, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain NetDecision script files (.nd) source code and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of NetDecision (4.6.1 or later), available from the NetDecision Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-1845.title: Google Chrome DEP code execution
CVE-2012-1845.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the DEP and ASLR protection mechanisms to execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-2033.title: Adobe Shockwave Player unspecified code execution
CVE-2012-2033.body: Adobe Shockwave Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. CVE-2012-2099.body: Wikidforum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Search Field. CVE-2012-3035.title: Emerson DeltaV packets denial of service

CVE-2012-3060.title: Cisco Unity Connection UDP denial of service
CVE-2012-3060.body: Cisco Unity Connection (UC) is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending specially-crafted UDP packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available CPU resources.Refer to Cisco Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3079.title: Cisco IOS neighbors denial of service
CVE-2012-3079.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service. By establishing many IPv6 neighbors, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available CPU resources.Refer to Cisco Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3094.title: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client
CVE-2012-3094.body: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the acceptance of arbitrary X.509 server certificates without user interaction by the VPN downloader in the download_install component. CVE-2012-3234.title: Real Networks RealPlayer codec frame size denial of service
CVE-2012-3234.body: Real Networks RealPlayer is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a divide-by-zero error in codec frame size. CVE-2012-3296.body: IBM Hardware Management Console (HMC) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the workingSet.jsp script. CVE-2012-3297.body: Tivoli Monitoring is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the HTTP monitoring console. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of system resources.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1610909 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3302.title: IBM Lotus Domino HTTP server cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-3302.body: Lotus Domino is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the HTTP server. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1608160 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3305.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server application file directory traversal
CVE-2012-3305.body: WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by deploying a specially-crafted application file to overwrite files outside of the application deployment directory.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1611313 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3309.title: IBM InfoSphere Guardium cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-3309.body: IBM InfoSphere Guardium is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3311.title: IBM Websphere Application Server CBIND security bypass
CVE-2012-3311.body: Websphere Application Server, when running on z/OS, could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by failure to perform CBIND checks when using Federated Repositories for IIOP connections using Optimized Local Adapters. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a client application to access or modify application data.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1611313 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3313.title: Multiple IBM products Host parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-3313.body: Multiple IBM products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. Under highly specialized conditions, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Host parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1610081 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3315.title: IBM Tivoli Federated Identity Manager management console servlets unauthorized access
CVE-2012-3315.body: Tivoli Federated Identity Manager could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access, caused by insufficient restrictions on management console servlets. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3316.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management TPAE cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-3316.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Tivoli Process Automation Engine (TPAE). A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentialsRefer to IBM Security Bulletin 1625624 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3317.title: IBM WebSphere Message Broker Uninstaller JVM file privilege escalation
CVE-2012-3317.body: WebSphere Message Broker could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges. When the Uninstaller JVM files are created, they are owned by user 501 and group 300 instead of the same user as other installed WebSphere Message Broker files. In certain configurations, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify files run by privileged users.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1611401 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3319.title: IBM Rational Business Developer Web services information disclosure
CVE-2012-3319.body: An error in IBM Rational Business Developer related to Web services could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1612314 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3321.title: IBM SmartCloud Control Desk security bypass

An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to applications.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1625624 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3322.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-3322.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1625624 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3323.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by a failure to invalidate the authentication session when WebSeal with Basic Authentication is used. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the application.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1651085 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3324.title: IBM DB2 UTL_FILE module directory traversal

An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by using a specially-crafted file name via a vulnerable application to view, modify, or delete arbitrary files on the system.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3325.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server PM44303 security bypass
CVE-2012-3325.body: WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when validating user credentials following application of APAR PM44303. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized administrative access to the application and potentially gain access to confidential and critical customer data. Note: WebSphere Application Server customers should consider the contextual risk to their environment when assessing the impact of this vulnerability.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2012-3326.title: Multiple IBM products uisessionid and csrftoken parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-3326.body: Multiple IBM products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the uisessionid or csrftoken parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1610081 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3327.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1625624 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3328.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2012-3336.body: IBM InfoSphere Guardium 8.0, 8.01, and 8.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2012-3337.body: IBM InfoSphere Guardium 8.0, 8.01, and 8.2 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to download arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 78284.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1611129 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3341.title: IBM InfoSphere Guardium multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-3341.body: IBM InfoSphere Guardium 7.0, 8.0, 8.01, and 8.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. CVE-2012-3350.body: Webmatic is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the Referer: parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-3355.title: Rhythmbox HTML template file symlink
CVE-2012-3355.body: Rhythmbox could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack. Temporary HTML template files are created insecurely. CVE-2012-3356.title: ViewVC svn_ra.py security bypass
CVE-2012-3356.body: ViewVC could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to honor authz rules by SVN revision view (svn_ra.py). CVE-2012-3357.body: ViewVC could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a log msg leak in SVN revision view (svn_ra.py) when a readable path is copied from an unreadable one. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of ViewVC (1.1.15 or later), available from the ViewVC Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-3358.title: OpenJPEG JPEG 2000 buffer overflow
CVE-2012-3358.body: OpenJPEG is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing malicious JPEG 2000 files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG 2000 file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to OpenJPEG Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-3367.title: Red Hat Certificate System Certificate Manager security bypass
CVE-2012-3367.body: Red Hat Certificate System could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of certificate revocation requests by the Certificate Manager web interface. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to revoke the CA certificate.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-3369.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform session hijacking
CVE-2012-3369.body: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by the retention of the password from the previous call by the JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack another user's previously-authenticated session and gain the victim's privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-3373.title: Apache Wicket unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-3373.body: Apache Wicket is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2012-3390.body: Moodle could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by missing permissions check in pluginfile for blocks. CVE-2012-3395.title: Moodle Feedback module SQL Injection
CVE-2012-3395.body: Moodle is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2012-3396.body: Moodle is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to MSA-12-0048 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-3399.title: Basilic diff.php command execution
CVE-2012-3399.body: Basilic could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by the diff.php script. CVE-2012-3401.title: LibTIFF t2p_read_tiff_init() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-3401.body: LibTIFF is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the t2p_read_tiff_init() function. CVE-2012-3410.body: GNU Bash is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by /dev/fd file names when checking file names. CVE-2012-3429.body: The Bind DynDB LDAP bind-dyndb-ldap package is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the dns_to_ldap_dn_escape() function when escaping DN values for the LDAP query. CVE-2012-3447.body: OpenStack Nova could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, due to an incomplete fix for an error related to a memory corruption vulnerability. CVE-2012-3509.body: GNU libiberty could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the _objalloc_alloc() function. CVE-2012-3528.body: Typo3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the backend. CVE-2012-3531.body: TYPO3 Install Tool is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2012-3577.body: Nmedia WordPress Member Conversation plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the doupload.php script. CVE-2012-3578.body: FCChat Widget plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the upload.php script. CVE-2012-3734.body: An error in Apple iOS Office Viewer related to support for viewing Microsoft Office files could allow unencrypted document data to be written to a temporary file.Refer to Apple Article: HT5503 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Kayako Fusion (4.40.985 or later), available from the Kayako Fusion Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-4875.title: Ghostscript OutputFile buffer overflow
CVE-2012-4875.body: Ghostscript is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling the OutputFile device parameter. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PostScript file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to Ghostscript Bugzilla Bug 692856 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-4877.title: FlatnuX controlcenter.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-4877.body: FlatnuX is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the controlcenter.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to xdb_fn_users. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-4878.title: FlatnuX controlcenter.php directory traversal

A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of OSClass (2.3.5 or later), available from the OSClass Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5164.title: Fork CMS multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5164.body: Fork CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the autocomplete.php, autosuggest.php, livesuggest.php and save.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Fork CMS (3.2.7 or later), available from the Fork CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5167.title: AContent field and id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2012-5167.body: AContent is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index_inline_editor_submit.php and user_password.php scripts using the field and id parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the AContent Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5167.title: AContent field parameter SQL injection
CVE-2012-5167.body: AContent is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index_inline_editor_submit.php script using the field parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the AContent Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5168.title: AContent index_inline_editor_submit.php security bypass
CVE-2012-5168.body: AContent could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by missing authentication checks in the index_inline_editor_submit.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the category name field parameter to bypass security restrictions to modify category names and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the AContent Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5168.title: AContent password field parameter security bypass
CVE-2012-5168.body: AContent could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by missing authentication checks in the index_inline_editor_submit.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the password field parameter to bypass security restrictions to modify user's passwords and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the AContent Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5169.title: AContent preview_top.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5169.body: AContent is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the preview_top.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the pathext, popup, framed, and file parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the AContent Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5170.title: Pebble open redirect
CVE-2012-5170.body: Pebble could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by an open redirect vulnerability. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.Upgrade to the latest version of Pebble (2.6.4 or later), available from the Pebble Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5196.title: Condor multiple buffer overflows
CVE-2012-5196.body: Condor is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows. By using unknown attack vectors, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Condor (7.8.4 or later), available from the Condor Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5223.title: vBSEO proc_deutf() function code execution
CVE-2012-5223.body: vBSEO could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the proc_deutf() function by functions_vbseocp_abstract.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted request to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Refer to vBSEO Web Site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2012-5224.title: vBadvanced CMPS template parameter file include
CVE-2012-5224.body: vBadvanced CMPS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the vba_cmps_include_bottom.php script using the template parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote or the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code using a local file, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5330.title: asaanCart index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5330.body: asaanCart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5330.title: asaanCart multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5330.body: asaanCart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by calc.php, chat.php, register.php and index.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5331.title: asaanCart index.php file include
CVE-2012-5331.body: asaanCart could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5333.title: Pre Printing Press page.php and product_desc.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-5333.body: Pre Printing Press is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the page.php and product_desc.php scripts using the id and pid parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of March 20, 2012.

CVE-2012-5334.title: Pre Printing Press page.php and product_desc.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-5334.body: Pre Printing Press is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the page.php and product_desc.php scripts using the id and pid parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of March 20, 2012.

CVE-2012-5334.title: Pre Printing Press pid and id parameters SQL injection
CVE-2012-5334.body: Pre Printing Press is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the product_desc.php and page.php scripts using the pid and id parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2012.

CVE-2012-5335.title: Tiny Server directory traversal
CVE-2012-5335.body: Tiny Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5341.title: StatIt statistik.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5341.body: StatIt is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the statistik.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the action, show and order parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5342.title: CommonSense CMS id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2012-5342.body: CommonSense CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the special.php, article.php and cat2.php scripts using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5343.title: Limny login.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5343.body: Limny is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the PHP_SELF parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5348.title: MangosWeb Enhanced index.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-5348.body: MangosWeb Enhanced is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the login parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5349.title: Pay With Tweet plugin for WordPress pay.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5349.body: Pay With Tweet plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the pay.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the link, title and dl parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5351.title: Apache Axis2 SAML security bypass
CVE-2012-5351.body: Apache Axis2 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a SAML assertion that lacks a Signature element to bypass the authentication process to forge messages.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5361.title: FFmpeg WMV code execution
CVE-2012-5361.body: FFmpeg could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error within the libavcodec library when parsing WMV files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted WMV file, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of FFmpeg (1.0 or later), available from the FFmpeg Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5367.title: OrangeHRM index.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-5367.body: OrangeHRM is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the sortField parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of OrangeHRM (2.7.1 or later), available from the OrangeHRM Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5371.title: Ruby hash generation function denial of service
CVE-2012-5371.body: Ruby is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the hash generation function. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.9.3-p327 or later), available from the Ruby Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5373.title: Java Murmur hash denial of service
CVE-2012-5373.body: Java is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Murmur hash function implementation. By sending multiple specially-crafted HTTP POST requests to an affected application containing conflicting hash key values, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of CPU resources.Apply the appropriate update for your system, See References.

CVE-2012-5387.title: White Label CMS plugin for WordPress admin.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-5387.body: White Label CMS plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of White Label CMS plugin (1.5.1 or later), available from the White Label CMS plugin Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5388.title: White Label CMS plugin for WordPress admin.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5388.body: White Label CMS plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the wlcms_o_developer_name field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of White Label CMS plugin (1.5.1 or later), available from the White Label CMS plugin Web site. CVE-2012-5389.title: PowerTCP WebServer for ActiveX denial of service
CVE-2012-5389.body: PowerTCP WebServer for ActiveX control (DartWebserver.dll) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5416.title: Cisco Unified MeetingPlace denial of service
CVE-2012-5416.body: Cisco Unified MeetingPlace is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Web Conferencing component. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the Web Conferencing server to become unresponsive.Refer to cisco-sa-20121031-mp for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5424.title: Cisco Secure Access Control System security bypass
CVE-2012-5424.body: Cisco Secure Access Control System (ACS) could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of the user-supplied password when TACACS+ is the authentication protocol. If the application is configured with a Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) external identity store, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to impersonate a user to bypass TACACS+ based authentication service.Refer to cisco-sa-20121107-acs for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5450.title: CMS Made Simple images.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-5450.body: CMS Made Simple is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the images.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to delete arbitrary files and folders. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of CMS Made Simple (1.11.2.1 or later), available from the CMS Made Simple Web site. CVE-2012-5452.body: Subrion CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. CVE-2012-5452.body: Subrion CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. CVE-2012-5455.body: Language Search component for Joomla! is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by an unspecified script. CVE-2012-5456.title: Zoner AntiVirus Free application for Android spoofing
CVE-2012-5456.body: Zoner AntiVirus Free application for Android could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the failure to verify that the server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) field of the X.509 certificate. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted certificate, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof an SSL server.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5458.title: VMware Workstation and Player privilege escalation
CVE-2012-5458.body: VMware Workstation and Player could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by insecure permissions being set on process threads. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the threads.Refer to VMSA-2012-0015 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5478.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform JMX Invoker security bypass
CVE-2012-5478.body: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to properly restrict access to users with specific roles by the JMX Invoker. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform JMX operations without having proper authentication.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5482.title: OpenStack Glance v2 API security bypass
CVE-2012-5482.body: OpenStack Glance could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an incomplete fix for an error related to the improper checking of the registry permissions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an image deletion request to delete non-protected image files.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the OpenStack GIT Repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5483.title: OpenStack Keystone secret key information disclosure
CVE-2012-5483.body: OpenStack Keystone could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by insecure permissions being set on the /etc/keystone/ec2rc file. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the secret key and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Keystone (2012.1.3-3.fc17 or later), available from the OpenStack Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5511.title: Xen HVM denial of service
CVE-2012-5511.body: Xen is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling certain HVM control operations. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to consume all available CPU resources.Refer to Xen Security Advisory 27 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5513.title: Xen XENMEM_exchange privilege escalation
CVE-2012-5513.body: Xen could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the failure to range check the guest provided addresses by the XENMEM_exchange handler. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to include the hypervisor reserved range and gain elevated privileges on the system.Refer to Xen Security Advisory 29 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5516.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager wipe-after-delete information disclosure
CVE-2012-5516.body: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly wipe-after-delete when moving disks between storage domains. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5519.title: CUPS SystemGroup privilege escalation
CVE-2012-5519.body: Common Unix Printing System (CUPS) could allow a local attacker gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper dropping of privileges for SystemGroup members. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read and write arbitrary system files with root privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5523.title: MantisBT cloned information disclosure
CVE-2012-5523.body: MantisBT could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when an issue is cloned and moved to another project. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view new notes from the cloned issue and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of MantisBT(1.2.12 or later), available from the MantisBT Web Site. See References.

CVE-2012-5529.title: Firebird TraceDSQLPrepare::prepare() denial of service
CVE-2012-5529.body: Firebird is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the TraceDSQLPrepare::prepare() function. By sending an empty dynamic SQL query when trace mode is enabled, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Firebird (2.5.2 or later), available from the Firebird Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5533.title: lighttpd http_request_split_value() denial of service
CVE-2012-5533.body: lighttpd is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the http_request_split_value() function when processing HTTP headers. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted "Connection" header to cause the application to enter into an endless loop.Upgrade to the latest version of lighttpd (1.4.32 or later), available from the lighttpd Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5542.title: Commerce Extra Panes module for Drupal unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-5542.body: Commerce Extra Panes module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2012-5574.title: Symfony unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2012-5574.body: Symfony could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper validation of user-supplied input. See References.

CVE-2012-5580.title: libproxy print_proxies() format string
CVE-2012-5580.body: libproxy could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a format string vulnerability in the print_proxies() function. By sending a specially-crafted request containing malicious format string specifiers, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5581.title: LibTIFF DOTRANGE buffer overflow
CVE-2012-5581.body: LibTIFF is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling DOTRANGE tags. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted TIFF file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the affected application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of LibTIFF (4.0.2 or later), available from the LibTIFF Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5603.title: Red Hat CloudForms Katello security bypass
CVE-2012-5603.body: Red Hat CloudForms could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of user permissions by Katello. An attacker with knowledge of the UUID of the target system could exploit this vulnerability to download consumer certificates or modify another users' settings.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5605.title: Red Hat CloudForms grinder insecure permissions
CVE-2012-5605.body: Red Hat CloudForms could allow a local attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, caused by the /var/lib/pulp/cache/grinder directory having insecure permissions for the cache folder. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the system to modify cache files.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5621.title: Ekiga UTF-8 denial of service
CVE-2012-5621.body: Ekiga is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing information from certain OPAL connections in which specific UTF-8 strings were not verified. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the executable to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Ekiga (4.0.0 or later), available from the Ekiga Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5633.title: Apache CXF WS-Security security bypass
CVE-2012-5633.body: Apache CXF could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper handling of requests. If the service is secured via WSS4JInInterceptor and unprotected by WS-SecurityPolicy, an attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP GET request using the URIMappingInterceptorfailure to bypass WS-Security processing and gain unauthorized access to restricted SOAP services.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache CXF (2.5.9, 2.6.6, or 2.7.3 or later), available from the Apache CXF Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5641.title: Apache CouchDB directory traversal
CVE-2012-5641.body: Apache CouchDB could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. CVE-2012-5648.body: Foreman is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2012-5651.body: Drupal core could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the user module when processing the search feature.
