CVE-2012-5758.title: IBM WebSphere Datapower XC10 administrative function access denial of service
CVE-2012-5758.body: IBM WebSphere Datapower XC10 is vulnerable to a denial of service. An unprotected interface exists in the WebSphere DataPower XC10 Appliance. This could allow an unauthorized user to stop WebSphere DataPower XC10 Appliance server processes without authentication.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1615783 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5759.title: IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 administrative privilege escalation
CVE-2012-5759.body: IBM WebSphere Datapower XC10 could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a vulnerability regarding JMX operations. Any authenticated user can perform any JMX operation. As a result, some administration operations may be performed by an authenticated user who does not belong to the administrative role.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1615783 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5760.title: IBM Netezza Platform Software SQL injection
CVE-2012-5760.body: IBM Netezza Platform Software is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the system using unspecified parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1624568 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5761.title: IBM Netezza Platform Software cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5761.body: IBM Netezza Platform Software is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1624568 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5762.title: IBM Netezza Platform Software MHTML cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5762.body: IBM Netezza Platform Software is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using encoded MHTML to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1624568 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5763.title: IBM Netezza Platform Software cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-5763.body: IBM Netezza Platform Software is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request on behalf of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1624568 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5765.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest SQL error information disclosure
CVE-2012-5765.body: IBM Rational ClearQuest could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to trigger SQL error messages and obtain information that could be used to launch further attacks against the system.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1620048 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5766.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator screens SQL injection
CVE-2012-5766.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator is vulnerable to SQL injection. An authenticated remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to various screens, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 1627982 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5782.title: Amazon Flexible Payments Service PHP Library SSL spoofing
CVE-2012-5782.body: Amazon Flexible Payments Service (FPS) PHP Library could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the failure to verify that the server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) field of the X.509 certificate. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted certificate, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof an SSL server.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5784.title: Apache Axis SSL spoofing
CVE-2012-5784.body: Apache Axis 1.4, as used in multiple products, could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the failure to verify that the server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) field of the X.509 certificate. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof an SSL server and launch further attacks against a vulnerable target.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5785.title: Apache Axis2/Java SSL spoofing
CVE-2012-5785.body: Apache Axis2/Java, as used in multiple products, could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the failure to verify that the server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) field of the X.509 certificate. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof an SSL server and launch further attacks against a vulnerable target.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5786.title: Apache CXF SSL spoofing
CVE-2012-5786.body: Apache CXF could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the failure to verify that the server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) field of the X.509 certificate by the wsdl_first_https sample code. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted certificate, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof an SSL server.For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2012-5828.title: Blackberry Playbook information disclosure
CVE-2012-5828.body: RIM Blackberry Playbook OS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error within the Web browser component. By planting and persuading a victim to download a specially-crafted HTML file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to RIM Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5829.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey nsWindow::OnExposeEvent() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-5829.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the nsWindow::OnExposeEvent() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to MFSA 2012-105 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5833.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey texImage2D calls code execution
CVE-2012-5833.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in specific texImage2D calls. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause a denial of service.Refer to MFSA 2012-106 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5835.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey webgl bufferdata integer overflow
CVE-2012-5835.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the WebGL subsystem when handling the webgl bufferdata. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause a denial of service.Refer to MFSA 2012-106 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5836.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey SVG denial of service
CVE-2012-5836.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling SVG text when setting CSS properties. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the browser to crash.Refer to MFSA 2012-94 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5837.title: Mozilla Firefox Developer Toolbar privilege escalation
CVE-2012-5837.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system caused by an error when script is entered into the Developer Toolbar. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or conduct or cross-site scripting attacks.Refer to MFSA 2012-102 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5839.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey gfxShapedWord::CompressedGlyph::IsClusterStart() buffer overflow
CVE-2012-5839.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the gfxShapedWord::CompressedGlyph::IsClusterStart() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to MFSA 2012-105 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5840.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey nsTextEditorState::PrepareEditor() code execution
CVE-2012-5840.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error in the nsTextEditorState::PrepareEditor() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause a denial of service.Refer to MFSA 2012-105 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2012-5851.title: WebKit WebCore security bypass
CVE-2012-5851.body: WebKit, as used in Google Chrome, could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in XSSAuditor.cpp in WebCore. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted string to bypass the cross-site scripting protection and launch further attacks on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5856.title: UK Cookie plugin for WordPress unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5856.body: UK Cookie plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by an unspecified script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5861.title: Multiple Sinapsi devices SQL injection
CVE-2012-5861.body: Multiple Sinapsi devices are vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the dettagliinverter.php and changelanguagesession.php scripts using the inverterselect or lingua parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version (2.0.2870_2.2.12 or later), available from the Sinapsi Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5862.title: Multiple Sinapsi devices default password
CVE-2012-5862.body: Multiple Sinapsi devices contains a default hard-coded password in the PHP file of the device. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable device.Upgrade to the latest version (2.0.2870_2.2.12 or later), available from the Sinapsi Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5863.title: Multiple Sinapsi devices command execution
CVE-2012-5863.body: Multiple Sinapsi devices could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by the ping.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ping parameter to inject and execute arbitrary commands on the system.Upgrade to the latest version (2.0.2870_2.2.12 or later), available from the Sinapsi Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5865.title: Achievo activityid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2012-5865.body: Achievo is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the dispatch.php script using the activityid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5866.title: Achievo include.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5866.body: Achievo is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the include.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the field parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5876.title: Nero MediaHome NMMediaServer.dll denial of service
CVE-2012-5876.body: Nero MediaHome is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a stack-based buffer overflow when handling the URI length within the NMMediaServer.dll dynamic-link library. By sending an overly long HTTP request to TCP port 54444, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and cause the service to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5883.title: Bugzilla Flash component cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5883.body: Bugzilla is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Flash component infrastructure in YUI script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using attack vectors related to swfstore.swf to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla (4.0.9,4.2.4, or 4.4 rc1 or later), available from the Bugzilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5884.title: Bugzilla User.get method information disclosure
CVE-2012-5884.body: Bugzilla could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the User.get method. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an XMLRPC request or a JSONRPC request to obtain sensitive information about the saved searches of arbitrary users.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5885.title: Apache Tomcat replay-countermeasure security bypass
CVE-2012-5885.body: Apache Tomcat could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the tracking of cnonce values instead of nonce and nc values by the replay-countermeasure functionality in the HTTP Digest Access Authentication implementation. By sniffing the network, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions.Upgrade to the latest version of Tomcat (5.5.36, 6.0.36, or 7.0.30 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References. For other distributions: Contact your vendor for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5886.title: Apache Tomcat HTTP Digest Access Authentication security bypass
CVE-2012-5886.body: Apache Tomcat could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the caching of information about the authenticated user within the session state by the HTTP Digest Access Authentication implementation. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions.Upgrade to the latest version of Tomcat (5.5.36, 6.0.36, or 7.0.30 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References. For other distributions: Contact your vendor for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5887.title: Apache Tomcat DIGEST security bypass
CVE-2012-5887.body: Apache Tomcat could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to properly check server nonces by the DIGEST authentication mechanism. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Tomcat (5.5.36, 6.0.36, or 7.0.30 or later), available from The Apache Software Foundation Web site. See References. For other distributions: Contact your vendor for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5888.body: seo_basics extension for TYPO3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by an unspecified script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to TYPO3-EXT-SA-2012-006 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5889.title: powermail extension for TYPO3 unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5889.body: The powermail extension for TYPO3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to TYPO3-EXT-SA-2012-004 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5890.title: Front End User Registration extension for TYPO3 multiple information disclsoure
CVE-2012-5890.body: Front End User Registration extension for TYPO3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the transmittal of user credentials in plaintext on utilization of edit perspective and autologin feature. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-middle attacks to obtain authentication credentials and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable application.Refer to TYPO3-EXT-SA-2012-002 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2012-5892.title: Havalite havalite.db3 information disclosure
CVE-2012-5892.body: Havalite could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the havalite.db3 database file. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download the database and gain unauthorized access to the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5894.title: Havalite hava_post.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-5894.body: Havalite is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the hava_post.php script using the postId parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5897.title: InTrust ActiveX control (ArDoc.dll) file overwrite
CVE-2012-5897.body: InTrust ActiveX control (ArDoc.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SaveToFile() insecure method to create and overwrite arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5902.title: DFLabs PTK modal_bookmark.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5902.body: DFLabs PTK is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the modal_bookmark.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5904.title: IrfanView .dib, .rle, and .bmp file buffer overflow
CVE-2012-5904.body: IrfanView is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing certain bitmap files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted dib, .rle, or .bmp file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of IrfanView (4.33 or later), available from the IrfanView Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5905.title: KnFTPd FEAT command denial of service
CVE-2012-5905.body: KnFTPd is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the FTP daemon when handling certain requests. By sending an overly long FEAT command attribute, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the daemon to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5906.title: GreenBrowser about: page cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5906.body: GreenBrowser is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the about: page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5907.title: TomatoCart json.php File Include
CVE-2012-5907.body: TomatoCart could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the json.php script using the module parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5908.title: MyBB index.php conditions[usergroup] parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5908.body: MyBB is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the conditions[usergroup] parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5909.title: MyBB index.php conditions[usergroup] parameter SQL injection
CVE-2012-5909.body: MyBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the conditions[usergroup] parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5910.title: B2Evolution CMS viewfile.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-5910.body: B2Evolution CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the viewfile.php script using the root parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the B2Evolution Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5911.title: B2Evolution CMS blog1.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5911.body: B2Evolution CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the blog1.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user_ID field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the B2Evolution Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5912.title: PicoPublisher page.php and single.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-5912.body: PicoPublisher is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to page.php and single.php scripts using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5913.title: WordPress Integrator wp-login.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5913.body: WordPress Integrator is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the wp-login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the redirect_to parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5914.body: Seditio is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the forums.php and pm.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the newmsg, rtext, or newpmtext fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (MarkHTML plugin), available from the Seditio Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-5915.title: Seditio multiple scripts information disclosure
CVE-2012-5915.body: Seditio could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to disclose sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5916.title: Seditio multiple scripts information disclosure
CVE-2012-5916.body: Seditio could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to disclose sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5917.body: SnackAmp Music Player is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by and error when parsing certain files. CVE-2012-5919.body: HavaLite CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the multiple scripts. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-5920.title: Google Web Toolkit unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5920.body: Google Web Toolkit is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2012-5936.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the secure flag for the session cookie in SSL mode. See References.

CVE-2012-5938.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server installation creates files with inadequate permission restrictions. CVE-2012-5939.title: IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager Welcome.do cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-5939.body: IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Welcome.do script. CVE-2012-6447.title: Splunk unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-6447.body: Splunk is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Splunk (5.0.3 or later), available from the Splunk Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-6451.title: Lorex LNC116 and LNC104 IP cameras security bypass
CVE-2012-6451.body: Lorex LNC116 and LNC104 IP cameras could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the validation of authentication details only on the home login page. By navigating to a valid URL on the interface other than the homepage, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the device.Upgrade to the latest version of Lorex LNC116 and LNC104 (030405 or later), available from the Lorex Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-6452.title: Axway Secure Messenger information disclosure
CVE-2012-6452.body: Axway Secure Messenger could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. A different HTTP header response is returned when a login attempt is made via an invalid password. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to enumerate valid usernames and gain unauthorized access to the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Secure Messenger (6.5.0 Updated Release 7 or later), available from the Axway Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-6494.title: Rapid7 Nexpose session hijacking
CVE-2012-6494.body: Rapid7 Nexpose could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by an error when logging session IDs in log files. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted link and log into the application, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack another user's account and gain the victim's privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Nexpose (5.5.4 or later), available from the Rapid7 Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-6501.title: HP PKI ActiveX control denial of service
CVE-2012-6501.body: The HP PKI ActiveX control (HPPKI.ocx) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the termination of user processes. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes a specially-crafted argument to the insecure KillProcess() method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to terminate legitimate processes and cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PKI ActiveX control (1.2.0.1 or later), available from the HP Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-6506.title: Zingiri Web Shop plugin for WordPress onecheckout.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-6506.body: Zingiri Web Shop plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the onecheckout.php script. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the notes field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Zingiri Web Shop (2.4.3 or later), available from the Zingiri Web Shop Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-6506.title: Zingiri Web Shop plugin for WordPress zing.inc.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-6506.body: Zingiri Web Shop plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the zing.inc.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Zingiri Web Shop plugin for WordPress (2.4.2 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2012-6507.title: ChurchCMS admin.php SQL injection
CVE-2012-6507.body: ChurchCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin.php script using uname and pass parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-6511.body: Organizer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php and users.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-6511.title: Organizer plugin for WordPress admin.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2012-6511.body: WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the delete_id and edit_id parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-6512.title: Organizer plugin for WordPress multiple scripts path disclosure
CVE-2012-6512.body: Organizer plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the multiple scripts to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-6518.title: Do It Yourself CMS modfile module cross-site request forgery
CVE-2012-6518.body: Do It Yourself CMS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the modfile module. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-6522.title: w-CMS 'p' parameter directory traversal
CVE-2012-6522.body: w-CMS could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing dot dot sequences (/../) in the 'p' parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2012-6553.body: Resource Hacker is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing certain control characters in the resource section. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Chat module for activeCollab (1.5.2 or later), available from the activeCollab Web site.
